description: '''Willi Ivanovich Tokarev''' ({{Langx|ru|link=no|Вилли Ива́нович То́карев}}; 11 November 1934 – 4 August 2019) was a Russian-American singer-songwriter. In the 1980s, he became famous throughout the [[Soviet Union]] for his songs about life as a Russian ''[[émigré]]'' in [[Brighton Beach]], New York.
